metalign.utils

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.utils.MathUtils

  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class of some utility functions that may need to used from multiple places.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod

    • Method Detail

      • gaussianWindow

        public static double gaussianWindow(double mean1,
                                    double mean2,
                                    double std)
        Evaluate a Gaussian window function with the given mean range and standard deviation. The formula is: G(m1, m2, s) = e ^ [(-1 / 2) * ([m2 - m1] / s) ^ 2]
        Parameters:
        mean1 - The low end of the mean range.
        mean2 - The high end of the mean range.
        std - The standard deviation.
        Returns:
        The value of the Gaussian window function.

      • getStandardNormal

        public static double getStandardNormal(double x,
                                       double mean,
                                       double std)
        Get the standard normal value given the x, mean, and standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        x - The value we want to measure.
        mean - The mean of the distribution.
        std - The standard deviation of the distribution.
        Returns:
        The standard normal value of the given x.

      • getMaxIndex

        public static int getMaxIndex(double[] array)
        Get the index of the first occurrence of the maximum value in the given array.
        Parameters:
        array - The array whose max we will find.
        Returns:
        The index of the first occurrence of the maximum value of the given array. Or, -1 if the maximum vlaue is Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY or the array has length 0.

      • getGCF

        public static int getGCF(int a,
                         int b)
        Get the greatest common factor of two integers.
        Parameters:
        a - The first integer.
        b - The second integer.
        Returns:
        Their greatest common factor.

      • getBeatsAroundTime

        public static java.util.List<Beat> getBeatsAroundTime(long time,
                                                      java.util.List<Beat> beats)
        Get the two beats from the given List closest to the given time. This is just a binary search but with beats, plus it returns two Beats.
        Parameters:
        time - The time we want the two closest beats.
        beats - A List of the Beats to search.
        Returns:
        A List of the two Beats closest to the given time.

      • getFirstIndexAroundTime

        public static int getFirstIndexAroundTime(long time,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> beats)
        Get the index of the time prior to the given time. This is just a binary search.
        Parameters:
        time - The time prior to which we want the index.
        beats - The times of the beats.
        Returns:
        The index just prior to the given time.

      • getF1

        public static double getF1(int truePositives,
                           int falsePositives,
                           int falseNegatives)
        Get the f-measure given TP, FP, and FN counts.
        Parameters:
        truePositives - TP
        falsePositives - FP
        falseNegatives - FN
        Returns:
        The F-1 score, or 0.0 if the result would be NaN.
